heading.name: Diabetes with HbA1C Testing
heading.definition: % of patients with diabetes aged 40 years and older who have had two or more HbA1C tests within the past 12 months
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from HQO's PCPM: Priority Measures for System and Practice Levels (Oct 2015)
heading.notes: This is a test template for the Diabetes with HbA1C Testing Indicator query

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN fin.a1c >= ${upperLimit.a1c} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS "% 2 or More HbA1c",
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN fin.a1c > ${lowerLimit.a1c} AND fin.a1c < ${upperLimit.a1c} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ), 0) AS "% Less than 2 HbA1c",
IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN fin.a1c = ${lowerLimit.a1c} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) ,0) AS "No HbA1c"
FROM (
SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, IFNULL(A1C.a1cnumber,0) AS a1c FROM demographic d INNER JOIN dxresearch dxr ON ( d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no)
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(m.id) AS a1cnumber, m.demographicNo FROM measurements m JOIN ( SELECT MAX(`name`) AS 'name' FROM measurementMap WHERE loinc_code LIKE ${loinc} GROUP BY `name` ) mm ON (mm.`name` = m.type) WHERE DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo ) A1C ON (d.demographic_no = A1C.demographicNo)
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND dxr.dxresearch_code IN ${dxcodes} AND dxr.`status` NOT LIKE "%D%" AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ( FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), ${lowerLimit.date} ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} ) ) fin;

drillDownQuery.query:
SELECT * FROM demographic d INNER JOIN dxresearch dxr ON ( d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no)
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(m.id) AS a1cnumber, m.demographicNo, MAX(m.dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements m JOIN ( SELECT MAX(`name`) AS 'name' FROM measurementMap WHERE loinc_code LIKE ${loinc} GROUP BY `name` ) mm ON (mm.`name` = m.type) WHERE DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.date} AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) A1C ON (d.demographic_no = A1C.demographicNo)
WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND dxr.dxresearch_code IN ${dxcodes} AND dxr.`status` NOT LIKE "%D%" AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ( FLOOR( ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), ${lowerLimit.date} ) ) / 365.25 ) >= ${lowerLimit.age} )
